title: Love Score
description:
In the future, an app debuts that can simulate your romance with a partner of your choosing and calculate the compatibility score. Is this a way to have a romance that never fails? What is it that people look for in a romance anyway?

This series has adult situations and some explicitness, but not the level you'd usually expect from LEN[A-7]'s other works.

Indonesian :
Seorang insan yang hanya ingin mencari jodoh di aplikasi online.
